verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am happy today and the sun shines bright, The clouds have been rolled away; For the Savior said Whosoever will, May come with Him to stay.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: “Whosoever” surely meaneth me, Surely meaneth me, O surely meaneth me; “Whosoever” surely meaneth me, “Whosoever” meaneth me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All my hopes have been raised, O His Name be praised, His glory has filled my soul; I’ve been lifted up and from sin set free, His blood hath made me whole.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O what wonderful love, O what grace divine, That Jesus should die for me! I was lost in sin, for the world I pined, But now I am set free.
